title: I'm surprised Orianna doesn't have a music box ballerina skin
body: you know those old jewelry boxes that have a windup ballerina that dances to music? It seems like a missed opportunity that she doesn't have a skin with that design

replies.body: Bonus points if her recall animation has the Orb transform into her music box, where she steps inside and dances in it while gradually slowing down until she stops, and it closes on her right when it teleports her back to base.
He recall animation in the winter wonder oriana skin is her dancing like a music box ballerina while a music box of the main theme plays.
